How to Choose a Progressive Web App Framework: Top 8 Tools

From AngularJS and React to Ionic and Lighthouse—here’s the list of the best PWA frameworks and tools to build progressive apps with in 2020.

  • VR/AR Market Is Maturing
  • AR Is Leading the Way
  • VR/AR for Augmented Training
  • VR/AR for Improved Production Efficiency
  • VR/AR to Wow Customers and Prospects
  • Emerging VR/AR Use Cases by Industry
  • VR/AR in Manufacturing
  • VR/AR in Retail
  • VR/AR in Healthcare
  • VR/AR in Automotive
  • Conclusion
The market as a whole has matured from ‘what is VR?’ to ‘how can I utilize VR?

In this report, we’ll take a look at the emerging applications of virtual and augmented reality tech in various industries, from retail to healthcare, covering some of the most promising use cases. This report will be useful for executives and team leaders looking to innovate, improve operational efficiencies, cut costs, and drive better business outcomes with thought-out VR/AR application.

VR/AR Market Is Maturing h2

Augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) technologies have been continuously growing for the past years. According to the latest report from PRNewswire, the global AR/VR market is expected to increase by 162.71 billion from 2020 to 2025, a CARG of 46%. Also, as per Crunchbase report, in 2021, VR/AR startups received nearly $3.9 billion of venture capital, which makes it the second-best year for VR/AR investment.

There are a number of factors contributing to the exponential growth of the AR/VR market.From metaverse to the drastic improvements in technology to the increasing number of use cases outside of entertainment, AR/VR market is destined to grow further.

Pandemic has also played a pivotal role in accelerating the VR/AR market growth. For example, HTC decided to hold its 2021 developer conference online in VR. Consumers also experienced a massive paradigm shift, resulting in many of them buying VR for entertainment and satisfying their social needs from home. Researchers from the University of Illinois have found out that those, who bought a VR headset during the pandemic were more likely to use it further for work and education.

AR Is Leading the Way h3

  • Using VR/AR to train medical professionals in equipment operations, diagnosis, and teamwork
  • Training military and police personnel by simulating combat and emergencies. For example, NYPD is training its force to deal with active shooters in VR simulations.
  • Making sure that employees are continuously educated on workplace safety and hazards.
  • Training on customer relationship management for the travel and leisure industry.
  • Training for extreme conditions and emergencies, like astronaut training at NASA.
